name: Here Runs Santa Claus
description:
Help Santa deliver all his presents on Christmas Eve night, all while inexplicably never going down a chimney. Avoid obstacles, collect powerups, and engage the long-dormant powers within him to keep going just a little bit farther... you know, for the children.

Controls

Keyboard and Mouse:

  • Space : (Double) Jump
  • Z : Activate Super Santa
  • X : Throw Present

Controller:

  • A : (Double) Jump
  • X : Activate Super Santa
  • Bumpers : Throw Present
System Requirements

MINIMUM:

  • Windows XP SP2, Vista, 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 1.1 compatible Graphics card (Note: Intel HD 4000 was tested and sufficient to run the game)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • .NET 4.0 Client (included in installer if not pre-installed)
  • XNA 4.0 Framework (included in installer if not pre-installed)
  • Hard Drive: 100MB available space
